original_text: Who, when they had examined me, would have let me go, because there was no cause of death in me.
korean_text: 로마인은 나를 심문하여 죽일 죄목이 없으므로 석방하려 하였으나

sentences.original_text: Who, when they had examined me
because there was no cause of death in me
sentences.korean_translation: 내 안에는 사형에 해당할 죄가 없었기 때문이다
